channel.title: New Monster Changes
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New Monster Changes"

item.title: Re: New Monster Changes
item.content:encoded:
Why? I don't fight monsters for the monster drop; I fight monsters because its my job as a villager. Everyone benefits from the upgrade. If I get a monster drop, than nice; if I don't, then oh well. There are enough perks to being in a NRF village that fighting the occasional monster isn't a problem.

If there was a system based on damage dealt, then I could see a problem. Chunin and Genin would never be able to compete. But this is fine.

item.title: Re: New Monster Changes
item.content:encoded:
I don't see how.

Any rank nin can attack if he has stamina. It's based on number attacks not hit damage.

Jonin and Sannin have more stamina, true, but this is the way game should play. Higher rank more benefits.

It's good system.

item.title: New Monster Changes
item.content:encoded: Whats everyones opinion on it? Seems like it would strongly discourage anyone but Jonin/Sannin Season 2+ from even bothering to attack.
